events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it and request a full refund because the product doesn’t meet my expectations.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund based on the mention of return and refund.
The case has been assigned to Agent Maria to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I see you’d like to return your order and get a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to return the product to process the refund smoothly?
My order number is 987654321. The product didn’t work as described, so I’m not satisfied and want my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request and sent you a prepaid return label. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will return the item today.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. Please check your account, and let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refunded amount and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
